entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High 10.
entry.summary: Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 10. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
